text:
催涙
スプレーだ!
誰か助けて!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.68%;top: 2.07%;width: 8.72%;height: 10.23%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 45.11%;top: 4.39%;width: 8.72%;height: 7.07%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
待てよ…
これただの
水だ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 73.09%;top: 13.78%;width: 7.87%;height: 9.76%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
心の底から
お詫び申し
上げます…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 18.62%;top: 71.22%;width: 10.64%;height: 10.85%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
穏やかな
午後が
台無しに…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 29.68%;top: 89.02%;width: 9.04%;height: 10.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.00%;top: 71.71%;width: 7.87%;height: 5.98%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
君と
一緒の午後は
楽しいよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 54.89%;top: 89.02%;width: 9.36%;height: 10.73%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;
